      A function to check if the country exists in the list of player assigned countries
      Parameters:
      p_Country - The country to be checked if present
      p_Player - The Player for whom the function is checked for

      true if country exists in the assigned country list else false

    • deployReinforcementArmiesFromPlayer

      Parameters:
      p_ArmyCount - The armies to be deployed to the country
      Returns:
      true if the armies are valid and deducted from the assigned army pool else false
